title: Website for an Educational Institution
description: A responsive website for an educational institute built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The site features a clean design with intuitive navigation, showcasing courses, faculty, events, and admission details. It provides a seamless user experience across devices, emphasizing accessibility and modern web practices.

title: E-com Clothing store
description: Developed a custom eCommerce clothing store on WordPress, featuring a custom-built theme from scratch using PHP and Advanced Custom Fields (ACF). Integrated payment gateways and utilized WordPress hooks for dynamic functionality, providing a smooth shopping experience and an easy-to-manage backend for store owners.

title: Food ordering website for a restaurant
description: Created a food ordering website using WordPress that showcases menu items and restaurant information. While it does not include order placement or payment features, the site offers an appealing design and easy navigation, allowing users to browse through various food options and learn more about the restaurant.
